task.title: Create a new WebHelp Publishing Template.
task.shortdesc: Skip this step if you already have a custom publishing template.

step.cmd: Open the transformation scenario dialog and select the publishing template you want to export.
If you need to adjust the output, you can set one or more transformation parameters from the Parameters tab. The edited parameters will be exported along with the selected template.
Click the Save Template as action.
Specify a name for the new template.
Uncheck the Include HTML Layout Pages option. It is not necessary for this step.
Specify the folder where the template will be exported.

result.p: A new ZIP archive will be created on disk in the specified location with the name specified in the dialog.
